abstract: Mr. Wachtel was a stock market analyst whose humor and trademark Brooklyn accent kept radio listeners attuned to the ups and downs of the markets for more than three decades.
snippet: Mr. Wachtel was a stock market analyst whose humor and trademark Brooklyn accent kept radio listeners attuned to the ups and downs of the markets for more than three decades.
lead_paragraph: Larry Wachtel, a stock market analyst whose humor and trademark Brooklyn accent kept radio listeners attuned to the ups and downs of the markets for more than three decades in the New York area, died on Sunday in Valhalla, N.Y. He was 77 and lived in Yonkers.

headline.main: Larry Wachtel, Market Analyst, Is Dead at 77
